casebody.data:
Diedrich J. Benson, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal from a judgment entered upon a decision of the court after a trial at an *579Equity Term. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment reversed and new trial ordered, with costs to the appellant to abide the event, for the reasons assigned by this court in “Cunningham v. the same defendants” decided at this general term.
